item.title: Who would win the 2026 World Cup if it kicked off today?
item.description: We're seven months from the start of the 2026 World Cup. While qualification wraps up, our writers answer a simple question: Who's winning it right no...

item.title: VAR Review: Why was Ronaldo sent off for Portugal?
item.description: Cristiano Ronaldo was shown a red card against the Republic of Ireland after appearing to elbow Dara O'Shea.

item.title: TreVeyon Henderson helps power Patriots to best record in NFL after win over Jets
item.description: New England moves to 9-2 as it breezes past New York on "Thursday Night Football".

item.title: How Roldan went from USMNT afterthought to Pochettino favorite
item.description: A few months ago, Cristian Roldan believed his USMNT career was drifting away. Now he could be in line for a key role under Mauricio Pochettino.

item.title: MLS changing to summer-spring schedule, with winter break
item.description: From 2027, the league will adopt a new schedule, but how will the league manage matches in frigid winters?
